title: Tape Player

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Once per game, activate the tape player, reviving all dead players as SCP-1507, a role with no abilities and a factional chat with all other flamingos.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Activating the tape player converts you into SCP-1507 Alpha.
- If an SCP-1507 (not the alpha) is visited twice in one night, they die.
- The town learns when the tape player is pressed.
- All SCP-1507 have a factional chat with each other, as well as having a factional kill (Basic attack).
- All SCP-1507's have no base defense.
- All SCP-1507's have the goal "Kill all who oppose the flamingos."
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: - Activate the tape player and win as SCP-1507 Alpha.
